PHOTON platform • ablog¶

The PHOTON platform - ablog is forked from https://github.com/sunpy/ablog at v0.10.25

ABlog is a Sphinx extension for generating a log oriented static site. It can be easily integrated with documentation for Python modules.

I am planning a major refactoring of this project, mostly to integrate it into a larger set of requirements. This will probably result in breaking changes to any further updates from SunPy.
